xml:
Hepatyrix<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Immunisation against hepatitis A and typhoid infection (primary course)

By intramuscular injection

  • Child 15–17 years

    1 mL for 1 dose, the deltoid region is the preferred site of injection; not to be injected into the buttock (vaccine efficacy reduced). The subcutaneous route may be used for patients with bleeding disorders, booster dose given using single component vaccines.

  • Adult

    1 mL for 1 dose, the deltoid region is the preferred site of injection; not to be injected into the buttock (vaccine efficacy reduced). The subcutaneous route may be used for patients with bleeding disorders, booster dose given using single component vaccines.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
